cause.description:
All it takes is a nickle, maybe even a penny, so that we can stop the ugly hunger that has plagued one Grant "Doo Doo" Brown. With your donation, you will get up-to-date information on the the bum you will be sponsering. With some hope, and a little luck, maybe, just maybe, we can buy Grant a new shirt, or a least a pack of gum and a condom. Lets all make sure this seed doesn't spread to future generations!
1. Grant is a bum
2. He eats garbage
3. He needs to get a job
cause.mission: Keep Grant Brown from eating pizza out of the garbage
cause.name: Give Grant Brown a Home Fund or GGBHF
